descriptions: Demonstrates no understanding of multi-digit multiplication; answers are consistently incorrect.
Makes frequent errors in multiplication facts and/or algorithm steps, leading to incorrect answers.
Makes several errors in multiplication facts or algorithm steps, impacting the accuracy of the final answer.
Makes occasional errors in multiplication facts or algorithm steps, but generally arrives at a correct answer.
Consistently multiplies multi-digit numbers correctly with minimal errors, demonstrating a strong understanding of the algorithm.
Fluently and accurately multiplies multi-digit numbers, demonstrating a comprehensive understanding of the standard algorithm with no errors.
Does not attempt to use the standard algorithm or uses it incorrectly, showing no understanding of its structure.
Attempts to use the standard algorithm but struggles with the steps and organization, leading to frequent errors.
Shows some understanding of the standard algorithm but makes mistakes in the process, such as incorrect place value alignment or carrying.
Generally applies the standard algorithm correctly, with only minor errors in place value or carrying.
Applies the standard algorithm effectively and correctly, demonstrating a solid understanding of the procedure.
Applies the standard algorithm fluently and efficiently, demonstrating a mastery of the procedure with clear and organized steps.
Demonstrates no understanding of place value concepts in the context of multi-digit multiplication.
Shows limited understanding of place value, resulting in misalignment of numbers and incorrect partial products.
Shows some understanding of place value but struggles to correctly align numbers and calculate partial products.
Generally understands place value and correctly aligns numbers, but may make occasional errors in calculating partial products.
Demonstrates a strong understanding of place value, correctly aligning numbers and calculating accurate partial products.
Demonstrates a thorough understanding of place value, accurately and consistently aligning numbers and calculating partial products to achieve correct solutions.
